name: An'kheria, The Flame Breaker
senses: Blindsight 10 ft., Darkvision 60 ft., Passive Perception 11
A0D: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.
A1D:
The dragon exhales ice in a 15-foot cone.
Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) ice damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
